MH1.name: Cabal Therapist
MH1.text:
Menace
At the beginning of your precombat main phase, you may sacrifice a creature. When you do, choose a nonland card name, then target player reveals their hand and discards all cards with that name.

MH1.name: Serra the Benevolent
MH1.text:
+2: Creatures you control with flying get +1/+1 until end of turn.
-3: Create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying and vigilance.
-6: You get an emblem with "If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead."

WAR.flavor:
"Give me a crew like this one and I'd rule any sea I sailed."
—Angrath
WAR.name: Ahn-Crop Invader
WAR.text:
As long as it's your turn, Ahn-Crop Invader has first strike.
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Ahn-Crop Invader gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

WAR.flavor: "I never liked you. Now get up—we have a fight to finish."
WAR.name: Aid the Fallen
WAR.text:
Choose one or both—
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.

WAR.flavor: Planeswalkers conjured replicas of old allies, reminders of the homeworlds that would fall next if Bolas prevailed.
WAR.name: Ajani's Pridemate
WAR.text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

WAR.name: Ajani, the Greathearted
WAR.text:
Creatures you control have vigilance.
+1: You gain 3 life.
-2: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and a loyalty counter on each other planeswalker you control.

WAR.flavor: "Grand city? No. This is nothing but another squalid cage."
WAR.name: Angrath's Rampage
WAR.text:
Choose one —
• Target player sacrifices an artifact.
• Target player sacrifices a creature.
• Target player sacrifices a planeswalker.

WAR.name: Angrath, Captain of Chaos
WAR.text:
Creatures you control have menace.
-2: Amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

WAR.flavor:
"If you don't speak wolf, allow me to translate: 'One step closer and I'll rip out your throat.'"
—Arlinn Kord
WAR.name: Arlinn's Wolf
WAR.text: Arlinn's Wolf can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

WAR.name: Arlinn, Voice of the Pack
WAR.text:
Each creature you control that's a Wolf or Werewolf enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
-2: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

WAR.flavor: "There is no future save the one my master wills."
WAR.name: Augur of Bolas
WAR.text: When Augur of Bolas enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

WAR.flavor: The Eternal armies advanced on Vitu-Ghazi. At Nissa's command, Vitu-Ghazi advanced on them.
WAR.name: Awakening of Vitu-Ghazi
WAR.text: Put nine +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a legendary 0/0 Elemental creature with haste named Vitu-Ghazi. It's still a land.

WAR.flavor: In times of peril, the vision the ancient paruns had for their city comes into focus.
WAR.name: Band Together
WAR.text: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.

WAR.flavor:
"I wish I could train a pack of them for hunting in the undercity. But I'd never dare turn my back, and I hate to think what I'd have to feed them."
—Zhosmir, urban huntmaster
WAR.name: Banehound
WAR.text: Lifelink, haste

WAR.flavor:
"Peril is in the eye of the beholder. At least, if your aim is good."
—Jaya Ballard
WAR.name: Blindblast
WAR.text:
Blindblast deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.

WAR.flavor:
"Tread upon these flower beds at your own peril."
—Emmara
WAR.name: Bloom Hulk
WAR.text: When Bloom Hulk enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

WAR.name: Bolas's Citadel
WAR.text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may play the top card of your library. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its converted mana cost rather than pay its mana cost.
{T}, Sacrifice ten nonland permanents: Each opponent loses 10 life.

WAR.flavor:
"Give them everything you've got . . . and some things you don't.
—Ral Zarek
WAR.name: Bolt Bend
WAR.text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
Change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.

WAR.flavor:
"Where did she come from? More importantly, are there more like her?"
—Gideon Jura
WAR.name: Bulwark Giant
WAR.text: When Bulwark Giant enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.

WAR.flavor: "This day will end in death, but not the one you hoped for. This day will end in victory, but not the one you expected."
WAR.name: Burning Prophet
WAR.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Burning Prophet gets +1/+0 until end of turn, then scry 1.

WAR.flavor:
"You say this Tenth District, not Rubblebelt. But where smash happen, that Rubblebelt. Rubblebelt state of mind."
—Urgdar, cyclops philosopher
WAR.name: Chainwhip Cyclops
WAR.text: {3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.

WAR.flavor: For most, war is a calamity. For some, an opportunity. And for the very few, a pleasure.
WAR.name: Challenger Troll
WAR.text: Each creature you control with power 4 or greater can't be blocked by more than one creature.

WAR.flavor:
"Now that I've dealt with your little toys, I can focus on the real problem: you."
—Chandra Nalaar, to Dovin Baan
WAR.name: Chandra's Pyrohelix
WAR.text: Chandra's Pyrohelix deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

WAR.flavor: Her triumph came from not achieving her ideal self, but from rejecting the idea of perfection.
WAR.name: Chandra's Triumph
WAR.text: Chandra's Triumph deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls. Chandra's Triumph deals 5 damage to that permanent instead if you control a Chandra planeswalker.

WAR.name: Chandra, Fire Artisan
WAR.text:
Whenever one or more loyalty counters are removed from Chandra, Fire Artisan, she deals that much damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
+1: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.
-7: Exile the top seven cards of your library. You may play them this turn.

WAR.flavor: "Thanks to my father, I know how to fight. He also showed me why I must."
WAR.name: Courage in Crisis
WAR.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

WAR.flavor: "Whichever side wins, I'm sure the banquet will be superb."
WAR.name: Cruel Celebrant
WAR.text: Whenever Cruel Celebrant or another creature or planeswalker you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

WAR.flavor:
"All I ask is complete obedience."
—Nicol Bolas
WAR.name: Crush Dissent
WAR.text:
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
Amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

WAR.flavor: Every storm has an eye.
WAR.name: Cyclops Electromancer
WAR.text: When Cyclops Electromancer enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

WAR.flavor: Shadows coiled around the witness's mind. Then the moment vanished, leaving only the sting of its loss.
WAR.name: Davriel's Shadowfugue
WAR.text: Target player discards two cards and loses 2 life.

WAR.name: Davriel, Rogue Shadowmage
WAR.text:
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, Davriel, Rogue Shadowmage deals 2 damage to them.
-1: Target player discards a card.

WAR.flavor:
"They say nothing lasts forever. I say everything lasts forever, just not in the form you may be accustomed to."
—Vraska
WAR.name: Deathsprout
WAR.text: Destroy target creature. Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

WAR.flavor: "My family was saved thanks to a single Boros soldier. It's why I joined the Legion. I will be the protector now."
WAR.name: Defiant Strike
WAR.text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.

WAR.flavor:
"For every inch of land they take from us, we take it back or we burn it. Give them nothing."
—Aurelia
WAR.name: Demolish
WAR.text: Destroy target artifact or land.

WAR.flavor: Ravnica held its breath as the hero of the resistance—their last hope—flew through the sky, his dark sword ready to strike a god.
WAR.name: Desperate Lunge
WAR.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

WAR.flavor: There's no crisis a hellion can't make worse.
WAR.name: Devouring Hellion
WAR.text: As Devouring Hellion enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures and/or planeswalkers. If you do, it enters with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.

WAR.flavor: "When civilization teeters on the brink, I'll be there to kick it the rest of the way."
WAR.name: Domri's Ambush
WAR.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.

WAR.name: Domri, Anarch of Bolas
WAR.text:
Creatures you control get +1/+0.
+1: Add {R} or {G}. Creature spells you cast this turn can't be countered.
-2: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.

WAR.flavor: "I see you've learned nothing, Chandra. You'd still put a match to something rather than understand it."
WAR.name: Dovin's Veto
WAR.text:
This spell can't be countered.
Counter target noncreature spell.

WAR.name: Dovin, Hand of Control
WAR.text:
Artifact, instant, and sorcery spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast.
-1: Until your next turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target permanent an opponent controls.

WAR.name: Dreadhorde Arcanist
WAR.text:
Trample
Whenever Dreadhorde Arcanist attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost less than or equal to Dreadhorde Arcanist's power from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

WAR.name: Dreadhorde Butcher
WAR.text:
Haste
Whenever Dreadhorde Butcher deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on Dreadhorde Butcher.
When Dreadhorde Butcher dies, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

WAR.name: Dreadhorde Invasion
WAR.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Whenever a Zombie token you control with power 6 or greater attacks, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

WAR.name: Dreadhorde Twins
WAR.text:
When Dreadhorde Twins enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have trample.

WAR.flavor: The Planar Bridge opened over the Chamber of the Guildpact, reducing the symbol of Ravnica's endurance to rubble.
WAR.name: Emergence Zone
WAR.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Emergence Zone: You may cast spells this turn as though they had flash.

WAR.name: Enter the God-Eternals
WAR.text: Enter the God-Eternals deals 4 damage to target creature and you gain life equal to the damage dealt this way. Target player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard. Amass 4. (Put four +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

WAR.flavor: An Izzet experiment begins with a "what if," gets approved with a "why not," and concludes with a "eureka!"
WAR.name: Erratic Visionary
WAR.text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

WAR.name: Eternal Skylord
WAR.text:
When Eternal Skylord enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have flying.

WAR.flavor:
"They are called Eternals. They will never stop."
—Jace Beleren
WAR.name: Eternal Taskmaster
WAR.text:
Eternal Taskmaster enters the battlefield tapped.
Whenever Eternal Taskmaster attacks, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

WAR.flavor: "To care for yourself, cultivate the world. To care for the world, cultivate yourself."
WAR.name: Evolution Sage
WAR.text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

WAR.name: Fblthp, the Lost
WAR.text:
When Fblthp, the Lost enters the battlefield, draw a card. If it entered from your library or was cast from your library, draw two cards instead.
When Fblthp becomes the target of a spell, shuffle Fblthp into its owner's library.

WAR.name: Feather, the Redeemed
WAR.text:
Flying
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets a creature you control, exile that card instead of putting it into your graveyard as it resolves. If you do, return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

WAR.name: Finale of Promise
WAR.text: You may cast up to one target instant card and/or sorcery card from your graveyard each with converted mana cost X or less without paying their mana costs. If a card cast this way would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead. If X is 10 or more, copy each of those spells twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.

WAR.flavor: The city mourned for Niv-Mizzet's death, but he left behind the components for this rebirth.
WAR.name: Firemind Vessel
WAR.text:
Firemind Vessel enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add two mana of different colors.

WAR.flavor: "Inform our allies in the Tenth and throw the circuit. It's about to get weird."
WAR.name: Flux Channeler
WAR.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

WAR.flavor: The druid knew only one spell, a charm to encourage rapid plant growth. When airborne Eternals invaded her arboretum, she had to get creative.
WAR.name: Forced Landing
WAR.text: Put target creature with flying on the bottom of its owner's library.

WAR.flavor:
"Sometimes Mowu is content to gnaw on a bone. Sometimes he wants the whole skeleton."
—Jiang Yanggu
WAR.name: Giant Growth
WAR.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

WAR.flavor: "Break their formation! Thin their ranks! I'm right behind you!"
WAR.name: Gideon's Battle Cry
WAR.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Gideon, the Oathsworn, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

WAR.flavor: "For the Legion! For Ravnica!"
WAR.name: Gideon's Company
WAR.text:
Whenever you gain life, put two +1/+1 counters on Gideon's Company.
{3}{W}: Put a loyalty counter on target Gideon planeswalker.

WAR.flavor: His triumph came not from victory over his enemies, but from the salvation of those who survived.
WAR.name: Gideon's Triumph
WAR.text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature that attacked or blocked this turn. If you control a Gideon planeswalker, that player sacrifices two of those creatures instead.

WAR.name: Gideon, the Oathsworn
WAR.text:
Whenever you attack with two or more non-Gideon creatures, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures.
+2: Until end of turn, Gideon, the Oathsworn becomes a 5/5 white Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn. (He can't attack if he was cast this turn.)
-9: Exile Gideon, the Oathsworn and each creature your opponents control.

WAR.name: Gleaming Overseer
WAR.text:
When Gleaming Overseer enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have hexproof and menace.

WAR.flavor: What he lacks in patience, intelligence, empathy, lucidity, hygiene, ability to follow orders, self-regard, and discernible skills, he makes up for in sheer chaotic violence.
WAR.name: Goblin Assailant

WAR.flavor: Under the veneer of the various guilds, each goblin has the same basic need: to run screaming at the enemy and hit a bunch of stuff.
WAR.name: Goblin Assault Team
WAR.text:
Haste
When Goblin Assault Team dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

WAR.name: God-Eternal Bontu
WAR.text:
Menace
When God-Eternal Bontu enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of other permanents, then draw that many cards.
When God-Eternal Bontu dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

WAR.name: God-Eternal Kefnet
WAR.text:
Flying
You may reveal the first card you draw each turn as you draw it. Whenever you reveal an instant or sorcery card this way, copy that card and you may cast the copy. That copy costs {2} less to cast.
When God-Eternal Kefnet dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

WAR.name: God-Eternal Rhonas
WAR.text:
Deathtouch
When God-Eternal Rhonas enters the battlefield, double the power of each other creature you control until end of turn. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.
When God-Eternal Rhonas dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

WAR.flavor: A dictator's infuriating smirk, an affront to everything Ravnica stood for.
WAR.name: God-Pharaoh's Statue
WAR.text:
Spells your opponents cast cost {2} more to cast.
At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses 1 life.

WAR.name: Grateful Apparition
WAR.text:
Flying
Whenever Grateful Apparition deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

WAR.flavor: Beneath each gleaming mineral shell rots a once-proud warrior of Amonkhet.
WAR.name: Grim Initiate
WAR.text:
First strike
When Grim Initiate dies, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

WAR.flavor: The mage looked within and realized there was still one piece of fuel to burn.
WAR.name: Heartfire
WAR.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or planeswalker.
Heartfire deals 4 damage to any target.

WAR.flavor: Amonkhet's dead flowed into a new world in service to their God-Pharaoh.
WAR.name: Herald of the Dreadhorde
WAR.text: When Herald of the Dreadhorde dies, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

WAR.flavor: In life, they revered a diverse pantheon of gods. Now they revere only the God-Pharaoh.
WAR.name: Honor the God-Pharaoh
WAR.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards. Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

WAR.flavor:
"If you can't save yourself, you fight to give someone else a chance."
—Ajani Goldmane
WAR.name: Ignite the Beacon
WAR.text: Search your library for up to two planeswalker cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

WAR.name: Ilharg, the Raze-Boar
WAR.text:
Trample
Whenever Ilharg, the Raze-Boar attacks, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Return that creature to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.
When Ilharg, the Raze-Boar dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

WAR.name: Interplanar Beacon
WAR.text:
Whenever you cast a planeswalker spell, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add two mana of different colors. Spend this mana only to cast planeswalker spells.

WAR.flavor: Death greeted the world with a roar of desert air.
WAR.name: Invade the City
WAR.text: Amass X, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

WAR.flavor:
"Fall back! You are no match for this."
—Samut
WAR.name: Invading Manticore
WAR.text: When Invading Manticore enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

WAR.flavor:
"Why would someone have built ... wait, never mind. Send it to the front lines!"
—Commander Grozdan
WAR.name: Iron Bully
WAR.text:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Iron Bully enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

WAR.flavor: His triumph was not in outsmarting Bolas's plan, but in understanding why ultimate power is self-defeating.
WAR.name: Jace's Triumph
WAR.text: Draw two cards. If you control a Jace planeswalker, draw three cards instead.

WAR.name: Jace, Wielder of Mysteries
WAR.text:
If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.
+1: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard. Draw a card.
-8: Draw seven cards. Then if your library has no cards in it, you win the game.

WAR.flavor: "We have visitors? Well, it'd be rude not to give them a traditional Keral Keep welcome."
WAR.name: Jaya's Greeting
WAR.text: Jaya's Greeting deals 3 damage to target creature. Scry 1.

WAR.name: Jaya, Venerated Firemage
WAR.text:
If another red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that permanent or player instead.
-2: Jaya, Venerated Firemage deals 2 damage to any target.

WAR.name: Jiang Yanggu, Wildcrafter
WAR.text:
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
-1: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

WAR.flavor:
"I can't protect everyone here. But those I can, I will."
—Karn
WAR.name: Karn's Bastion
WAR.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

WAR.name: Karn, the Great Creator
WAR.text:
Activated abilities of artifacts your opponents control can't be activated.
+1: Until your next turn, up to one target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost.
-2: You may choose an artifact card you own from outside the game or in exile, reveal that card, and put it into your hand.

WAR.flavor:
"Hop away now, little Eternal. Go eat some flies."
—Kasmina
WAR.name: Kasmina's Transmutation
WAR.text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 1/1.

WAR.name: Kasmina, Enigmatic Mentor
WAR.text:
Spells your opponents cast that target a creature or planeswalker you control cost {2} more to cast.
-2: Create a 2/2 blue Wizard creature token. Draw a card, then discard a card.

WAR.flavor: The Eternals found some sparks to be quite slippery.
WAR.name: Kaya's Ghostform
WAR.text:
Enchant creature or planeswalker you control
When enchanted permanent dies or is put into exile, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

WAR.name: Kaya, Bane of the Dead
WAR.text:
Your opponents and permanents your opponents control with hexproof can be the target of spells and abilities you control as though they didn't have hexproof.
-3: Exile target creature.

WAR.flavor:
"When your enemy flees, send the sea to pursue them."
—Kiora
WAR.name: Kiora's Dambreaker
WAR.text: When Kiora's Dambreaker enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each a counter of each kind already there.)

WAR.name: Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner
WAR.text:
Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
-1: Untap target permanent.

WAR.flavor: "After the people flee, but before the enemy arrives—that's grabbin' time."
WAR.name: Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin
WAR.text: Whenever Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to Krenko's power.

WAR.flavor: Looking over two city blocks of destruction, he could only cackle with pride.
WAR.name: Kronch Wrangler
WAR.text:
Trample
Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Kronch Wrangler.

WAR.flavor:
"See that no one enters or leaves New Prahv today. And notify me at once of any Planeswalker activity."
—Dovin Baan
WAR.name: Law-Rune Enforcer
WAR.text: {1}, {T}: Tap target creature with converted mana cost 2 or greater.

WAR.flavor:
"I know I should be more concerned. But a big, blue zombie-potamus from beyond the stars? This is what they're invading us with?"
—Mileva, Boros legionnaire
WAR.name: Lazotep Behemoth
Lazotep Plating
WAR.text:
Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
You and permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (You and they can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

WAR.flavor: Despite their many forms, the Eternals worked in chilling harmony, unburdened by instinct or emotion.
WAR.name: Lazotep Reaver
WAR.text: When Lazotep Reaver enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

WAR.flavor: It feeds on the dark energies that course through the deep world—and on any other creature lured by the leyline's pull.
WAR.name: Leyline Prowler
WAR.text:
Deathtouch, lifelink
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

WAR.name: Liliana's Triumph
WAR.text: Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a Liliana planeswalker, each opponent also discards a card.

WAR.name: Liliana, Dreadhorde General
WAR.text:
Whenever a creature you control dies, draw a card.
+1: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
-4: Each player sacrifices two creatures.
-9: Each opponent chooses a permanent they control of each permanent type and sacrifices the rest.

WAR.flavor:
"The ancient places of Ravnica awaken, stirred by the hoofbeats of Ilharg!"
—Nikya of the Old Ways
WAR.name: Living Twister
WAR.text:
{1}{R}, Discard a land card: Living Twister deals 2 damage to any target.
{G}: Return a tapped land you control to its owner's hand.

WAR.flavor: His voice is both war horn and rallying cry, a trumpeting call that stirs even the faintest heart.
WAR.name: Loxodon Sergeant
WAR.text:
Vigilance
When Loxodon Sergeant enters the battlefield, other creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.

WAR.flavor: Their ranks are thin, their formation is improvised, their weapons are borrowed, and you'd best get out of their way.
WAR.name: Makeshift Battalion
WAR.text: Whenever Makeshift Battalion and at least two other creatures attack, put a +1/+1 counter on Makeshift Battalion.

WAR.flavor: "If I am to die in service, there is no more worthy fight than this."
WAR.name: Martyr for the Cause
WAR.text: When Martyr for the Cause dies, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

WAR.name: Massacre Girl
WAR.text:
Menace
When Massacre Girl enters the battlefield, each other creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Whenever a creature dies this turn, each creature other than Massacre Girl gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

WAR.flavor: Despite their stake in the city's survival, Rakdos cultists are loath to pass up any opportunity to sow chaos.
WAR.name: Mayhem Devil
WAR.text: Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, Mayhem Devil deals 1 damage to any target.

WAR.name: Merfolk Skydiver
WAR.text:
Flying
When Merfolk Skydiver enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
{3}{G}{U}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

WAR.name: Mizzium Tank
WAR.text:
Trample
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Mizzium Tank becomes an artifact creature and gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

WAR.flavor: Sometimes the strongest weapon you can hold in your hand is another hand.
WAR.name: Mobilized District
WAR.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}: Mobilized District becomes a 3/3 Citizen creature with vigilance until end of turn. It's still a land. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each legendary creature and planeswalker you control.

WAR.flavor: Wherever Yanggu goes, Mowu follows—sometimes at his side, sometimes obscuring him from view entirely.
WAR.name: Mowu, Loyal Companion
WAR.text:
Trample, vigilance
If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on Mowu, Loyal Companion, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.

WAR.flavor:
"I recognize that headdress. This one was feared even by her fellow initiates."
—Samut
WAR.name: Naga Eternal

WAR.flavor: The ancient Planeswalkers Sorin and Nahiri battled across Ravnica, their blows cutting as deep as their grudge.
WAR.name: Nahiri's Stoneblades
WAR.text: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+0 until end of turn.

WAR.name: Nahiri, Storm of Stone
WAR.text:
As long as it's your turn, creatures you control have first strike and equip abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate.
-X: Nahiri, Storm of Stone deals X damage to target tapped creature.

WAR.name: Neheb, Dreadhorde Champion
WAR.text:
Trample
Whenever Neheb, Dreadhorde Champion deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may discard any number of cards. If you do, draw that many cards and add that much {R}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

WAR.name: Neoform
WAR.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost, put that card onto the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it, then shuffle your library.

WAR.flavor: Her triumph came not from destroying the unnatural, but from fostering life.
WAR.name: Nissa's Triumph
WAR.text: Search your library for up to two basic Forest cards. If you control a Nissa planeswalker, instead search your library for up to three land cards. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

WAR.name: Nissa, Who Shakes the World
WAR.text:
Whenever you tap a Forest for mana, add an additional {G}.
+1: Put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target noncreature land you control. Untap it. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with vigilance and haste that's still a land.
-8: You get an emblem with "Lands you control have indestructible." Search your library for any number of Forest cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

WAR.name: Niv-Mizzet Reborn
WAR.text:
Flying
When Niv-Mizzet Reborn enters the battlefield, reveal the top ten cards of your library. For each color pair, choose a card that's exactly those colors from among them. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

WAR.flavor: Jace surmised that they were walking into Bolas's trap. He felt no joy in being right.
WAR.name: No Escape
WAR.text:
Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
Scry 1.

WAR.flavor: Trapped on Ravnica with no affection for either side, Ob Noxilis sought gratification in random acts of torment.
WAR.name: Ob Nixilis's Cruelty
WAR.text: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

WAR.name: Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted
WAR.text:
Whenever an opponent draws a card, Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted deals 1 damage to that player.
-2: Destroy target creature. Its controller draws two cards.

WAR.flavor:
"So much wealth. So much splendor. So much temptation to believe the gilded lie."
—Kaya
WAR.name: Orzhov Guildgate
WAR.text:
Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

WAR.flavor: "There are many kinds of duty, and mine is to see our world grow and endure."
WAR.name: Paradise Druid
WAR.text:
Paradise Druid has hexproof as long as it's untapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

WAR.name: Parhelion II
WAR.text:
Flying, first strike, vigilance
Whenever Parhelion II attacks, create two 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance that are attacking.
Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

WAR.flavor:
"No one hero will save this day. Today we must all be heroes."
—Gideon Jura
WAR.name: Pledge of Unity
WAR.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. You gain 1 life for each creature you control.

WAR.name: Pollenbright Druid
WAR.text:
When Pollenbright Druid enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
• Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

WAR.flavor: "I don't understand. He's normally so well behaved!"
WAR.name: Pouncing Lynx
WAR.text: As long as it's your turn, Pouncing Lynx has first strike.

WAR.flavor: Elite training, singled-minded devotion, and lazotep coating help only so much for invaders who are fundamentally bite-sized.
WAR.name: Primordial Wurm

WAR.flavor:
"Seeing so much easy prey makes her crazy. See how she snorts and drools?"
—Dhuuz, kronch wrangler
WAR.name: Raging Kronch
WAR.text: Raging Kronch can't attack alone.

WAR.flavor:
"Time to find the melting point of lazotep."
—Ral Zarek
WAR.name: Ral's Outburst
WAR.text: Ral's Outburst deals 3 damage to any target. Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

WAR.name: Ral, Storm Conduit
WAR.text:
Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Ral, Storm Conduit deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
+2: Scry 1.
-2: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

WAR.flavor: Even the clouds became a field of battle. Known as the Sky Theater, it saw the Eternals clash with squadrons of angels.
WAR.name: Rally of Wings
WAR.text: Untap all creatures you control. Creatures you control with flying get +2/+2 until end of turn.

WAR.flavor: The heart of Ravnica disappeared before anyone could strike a blow in its defense.
WAR.name: Ravnica at War
WAR.text: Exile all multicolored permanents.

WAR.flavor: They approach in formation, every movement efficient and sure. They halt, listen, and then press on in silent unison.
WAR.name: Relentless Advance
WAR.text: Amass 3. (Put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

WAR.flavor: "Now, little fighter, show me you deserved this second chance."
WAR.name: Rescuer Sphinx
WAR.text:
Flying
As Rescuer Sphinx enters the battlefield, you may return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand. If you do, Rescuer Sphinx enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.

WAR.flavor: Grief is a crucible where resolve is tempered.
WAR.name: Rising Populace
WAR.text: Whenever another creature or planeswalker you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Rising Populace.

WAR.name: Roalesk, Apex Hybrid
WAR.text:
Flying, trample
When Roalesk, Apex Hybrid enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control.
When Roalesk dies, proliferate, then proliferate again. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there. Then do it again.)

WAR.flavor: Uthlon the Wise scandalized sphinx society, hooting the answers to riddles as he rampaged through Tin Street. Grangle, on the other hand, sat for hours, deep in thought, largely ignored by fellow goblins.
WAR.name: Role Reversal
WAR.text: Exchange control of two target permanents that share a permanent type.

WAR.flavor: "Track the source of those thopters," Saheeli told her creation. "And feel free to snack on as many as you want."
WAR.name: Saheeli's Silverwing
WAR.text:
Flying
When Saheeli's Silverwing enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target opponent's library.

WAR.name: Saheeli, Sublime Artificer
WAR.text:
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
-2: Target artifact you control becomes a copy of another target artifact or creature you control until end of turn, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

WAR.flavor: Samut's war was intensely personal. Every hour she faced enemies she once loved as friends and horrors she once revered as gods.
WAR.name: Samut's Sprint
WAR.text: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.

WAR.name: Samut, Tyrant Smasher
WAR.text:
Creatures you control have haste.
-1: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.

WAR.flavor:
"It's faster than we are. Draw its attention while the Ledev take aim!"
—Shauntal, Boros legionnaire
WAR.name: Shriekdiver
WAR.text:
Flying
{1}: Shriekdiver gains haste until end of turn.

WAR.name: Silent Submarine
WAR.text:
Whenever Silent Submarine deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, draw a card.
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

WAR.flavor: Not even a threat to the entire Multiverse could persuade them to put aside their feud.
WAR.name: Single Combat
WAR.text: Each player chooses a creature or planeswalker they control, then sacrifices the rest. Players can't cast creature or planeswalker spells until the end of your next turn.

WAR.flavor:
"The primary weapon is nothing more than light. It shows them what they are, and they burn of their own accord."
—Aurelia
WAR.name: Solar Blaze
WAR.text: Each creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

WAR.flavor:
"I see you're out of the wall."
—Nahiri
WAR.name: Sorin's Thirst
WAR.text: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.

WAR.name: Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord
WAR.text:
As long as it's your turn, creatures and planeswalkers you control have lifelink.
+2: Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
-X: Return target creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a Vampire in addition to its other types.

WAR.name: Spark Double
WAR.text: You may have Spark Double enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature or planeswalker you control, except it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it if it's a creature, it enters with an additional loyalty counter on it if it's a planeswalker, and it isn't legendary if that permanent is legendary.

WAR.flavor: Freed from their respective labs, the two weirds formed a partnership, feeding on the arcane energies of war.
WAR.name: Spellgorger Weird
WAR.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Spellgorger Weird.

WAR.flavor: They worked well as a team, but they knew it couldn't last forever.
WAR.name: Spellkeeper Weird
WAR.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Spellkeeper Weird: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

WAR.flavor: The archer's heart broke seeing her compatriots die far below, but she held position until the enemy was in range.
WAR.name: Steady Aim
WAR.text: Untap target creature. It gets +1/+4 and gains reach until end of turn.

WAR.flavor:
"What they don't know will definitely hurt them."
—Lazav
WAR.name: Stealth Mission
WAR.text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. That creature can't be blocked this turn.

WAR.flavor: In times of war, only death flourishes.
WAR.name: Storrev, Devkarin Lich
WAR.text:
Trample
Whenever Storrev, Devkarin Lich deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, return to your hand target creature or planeswalker card in your graveyard that wasn't put there this combat.

WAR.flavor: At Feather's command, squadrons of battle angels swarmed out of the Parhelion II, unsheathing blades made of molten dawn.
WAR.name: Sunblade Angel
WAR.text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink

WAR.flavor: Tamiyo wished only to observe the war, but she soon realized neutrality was not an option.
WAR.name: Tamiyo's Epiphany
WAR.text: Scry 4, then draw two cards.

WAR.name: Tamiyo, Collector of Tales
WAR.text:
Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to discard cards or sacrifice permanents.
+1: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all cards with the chosen name from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
-3: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

WAR.flavor: "The safest place for you is not now."
WAR.name: Teferi's Time Twist
WAR.text: Exile target permanent you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. If it enters the battlefield as a creature, it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

WAR.name: Teferi, Time Raveler
WAR.text:
Each opponent can cast spells only any time they could cast a sorcery.
+1: Until your next turn, you may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash.
-3: Return up to one target artifact, creature, or enchantment to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

WAR.flavor:
"The Tenth is under heavy attack, but it's being handled. I sent Mileva."
—Tajic
WAR.name: Tenth District Legionnaire
WAR.text:
Haste
Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tenth District Legionnaire, put a +1/+1 counter on Tenth District Legionnaire, then scry 1.

WAR.flavor: Teyo gifted shields to as many allies as possible, knowing he could not always be there to protect them himself.
WAR.name: Teyo's Lightshield
WAR.text: When Teyo's Lightshield enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

WAR.name: Teyo, the Shieldmage
WAR.text:
You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
-2: Create a 0/3 white Wall creature token with defender.

WAR.name: Tezzeret, Master of the Bridge
WAR.text:
Creature and planeswalker spells you cast have affinity for artifacts.
+2: Tezzeret, Master of the Bridge deals X damage to each opponent, where X is the number of artifacts you control. You gain X life.
-3: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
-8: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Put all artifact cards from among them onto the battlefield.

WAR.name: The Wanderer
WAR.text:
Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to you and other permanents you control.
-2: Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.

WAR.flavor:
"I thought this was a civilized place. How are there so many feral beasts?"
—Dovin Baan
WAR.name: Thundering Ceratok
WAR.text:
Trample
When Thundering Ceratok enters the battlefield, other creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.

WAR.flavor:
"Find out whose that is. I like its energy."
—Judith
WAR.name: Tibalt's Rager
WAR.text:
When Tibalt's Rager dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.
{1}{R}: Tibalt's Rager gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

WAR.name: Tibalt, Rakish Instigator
WAR.text:
Your opponents can't gain life.
-2: Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "Whenever this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

WAR.flavor:
"To comprehend the full answer requires years of temporal study. In short, they were now never born in the first place."
—Teferi
WAR.name: Time Wipe
WAR.text: Return a creature you control to its owner's hand, then destroy all creatures.

WAR.name: Toll of the Invasion
WAR.text:
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

WAR.name: Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves
WAR.text:
When Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves enters the battlefield, create Voja, Friend to Elves, a legendary 3/3 green and white Wolf creature token.
Whenever a Wolf enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 3 life and that creature fights up to one target creature an opponent controls.

WAR.flavor: "Some bend the law. I tie it into knots.
WAR.name: Tomik, Distinguished Advokist
WAR.text:
Flying
Lands on the battlefield and land cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.
Your opponents can't play land cards from graveyards.

WAR.flavor: Bolas cared little when his statue fell, thinking it a useful distraction, underestimating the surge of resolve it gave his opponents.
WAR.name: Topple the Statue
WAR.text:
Tap target permanent. If it's an artifact, destroy it.
Draw a card.

WAR.flavor: At least this was better than that week at the Juri Revue.
WAR.name: Totally Lost
WAR.text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

WAR.flavor: Common Gruul career aspirations: berserker, shaman, catapault.
WAR.name: Turret Ogre
WAR.text:
Reach
When Turret Ogre enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, Turret Ogre deals 2 damage to each opponent.

WAR.name: Vivien's Arkbow
WAR.text: {X}, {T}, Discard a card: Look at the top X cards of your library. You may put a creature card with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

WAR.name: Vivien's Grizzly
WAR.text: {3}{G}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature or planeswalker card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don't put the card into your hand, put it on the bottom of your library.

WAR.name: Vivien, Champion of the Wilds
WAR.text:
You may cast creature spells as though they had flash.
+1: Until your next turn, up to one target creature gains vigilance and reach.
-2: Look at the top three cards of your library. Exile one face down and put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. For as long as it remains exiled, you may look at that card and you may cast it if it's a creature card.

WAR.flavor: His blessing is a curse.
WAR.name: Vizier of the Scorpion
WAR.text:
When Vizier of the Scorpion enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have deathtouch.

WAR.flavor: "You might have pleaded your case with my queen earlier. Now I am here, and it is far too late."
WAR.name: Vraska's Finisher
WAR.text: When Vraska's Finisher enters the battlefield, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.

WAR.name: Vraska, Swarm's Eminence
WAR.text:
Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
-2: Create a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals damage to a planeswalker, destroy that planeswalker."

WAR.flavor:
"Precise, clean cuts. No one saw anything. Again. Tag the report with my code and file it."
—Lavinia
WAR.name: Wanderer's Strike
WAR.text: Exile target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

WAR.flavor: Soaring over Vitu-Ghazi, New Prahv, and Orzhova, the Conclave's trained falcons provided critical intelligence.
WAR.name: War Screecher
WAR.text:
Flying
{5}{W}, {T}: Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

WAR.flavor:
"The Eternals had to endure Amonkhet's five trails. Let's see if they can pass the Trial of Ravnica."
—Jace Beleren
WAR.name: Wardscale Crocodile
WAR.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

WAR.name: Widespread Brutality
WAR.text: Amass 2, then the Army you amassed deals damage equal to its power to each non-Army creature. (To amass 2, put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
